channel.title: Project 420!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/Project420banner.jpg[/img]
[u][b][size=36pt]~Combat System~[/size][/b][/u] Best combat ever seen in a Delta based server! Perfect Ags special & stance & gfx Perfect Bgs special & stance & gfx Perfect Zgs special & stance & gfx Perfect Zgs special & stance & gfx Perfect ss special & stance 525 Whip Anime walk+attack+block 474 Dragon Claw spec + 50% gfx(Need to find the right gfx) Range + Magic needs some work (doesn't follow while attacking) Melee follows with special
[u][b][size=36pt]~Minigames~[/size][/b][/u] Assault 100% (Custom status) Castle Wars 75% (100% for delta) Clan Wars 100% My pets 100% (Custom for pvp armor) Barrows 50% (need to redo barrows) Chamber of Gods 25% (Making it like assault) Fight Pits 100% Jad 7 Waves 100% God Wars 100% (for Delta) Fun Pk 100% Pest Control 70% (No Npcs yet)
[u][b][size=36pt]~Citys~[/size][/b][/u] [Varrock] Npc's Added:50% Skills added: Mining/Woodcutting/Anvil Smithing/Herblore
[Falador] Npc's Added:45% Skills added:Woodcutting/Crafting/Furnace Smithing/Agility teleporter(Fruit pirate)
[Ardy] Npc's Added:25% Skills added:Theving
[Edgeville] Npc's Added:80% Skills added:Slayer/Woodcutting
[Cathy] Npc's Added:50% Skills added:Fishing/Flecthing/Firemaking/Woodcutting
[Lumby] Npc's Added:75% Skills added:Prayer/Fishing/Woodcutting/Furnace Smithing
[u][b]Details:[/b][/u] Pretty much I've been working on this for quiet awhile and I was wondering if some good coders can help me complete my project. I am a ok coder not the best and would love to learn from the best if you can help me out. Please comment and tell me what you think or what I should edit. Send me TUT's that are useful anything to make this server better. thanks for reading!
Red:Havn't Started Yellow:Started
[u][b]To do list:[/b][/u] Highscores Add alot more npc's Make more quest Fix up minigames Webclient Fix gates all around world map
[size=24pt][Pictures][/size] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/ags.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/bgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/sgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/zgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/ss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/castlewars.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/teles.jpg[/img] [u][b]IF ANYONE CAN HELP ME PLEASE CONTACT ME![/b][/u] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/badgates.jpg[/img]
[u][b]CUSTOM SKILLCAPES IF YOU KNOW HOW TO DO REAL ONES CONTACT ME :D[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/skillcapes.jpg[/img]
Development Team: Main Coder: Mikey 2nd Coder: ~Open~ 3rd Coder: ~Open~ 4th Coder: ~Open~
Credit: Razami A.K.A Mikey 70% Dragon History 20% Delta 10%

item.title: Project 420!
item.dc:creator: @razami razami
item.description:
@razami wrote:

[size=36pt]~Combat System~[/size]
Best combat ever seen in a Delta based server!
Perfect Ags special & stance & gfx
Perfect Bgs special & stance & gfx
Perfect Zgs special & stance & gfx
Perfect Zgs special & stance & gfx
Perfect ss special & stance
525 Whip Anime walk+attack+block
474 Dragon Claw spec + 50% gfx(Need to find the right gfx)
Range + Magic needs some work (doesn’t follow while attacking)
Melee follows with special

[size=36pt]~Minigames~[/size]
Assault 100% (Custom status)
Castle Wars 75% (100% for delta)
Clan Wars 100%
My pets 100% (Custom for pvp armor)
Barrows 50% (need to redo barrows)
Chamber of Gods 25% (Making it like assault)
Fight Pits 100%
Jad 7 Waves 100%
God Wars 100% (for Delta)
Fun Pk 100%
Pest Control 70% (No Npcs yet)

[size=36pt]~Citys~[/size]
[Varrock]
Npc’s Added:50%
Skills added: Mining/Woodcutting/Anvil Smithing/Herblore

[Falador]
Npc’s Added:45%
Skills added:Woodcutting/Crafting/Furnace Smithing/Agility teleporter(Fruit pirate)

[Ardy]
Npc’s Added:25%
Skills added:Theving

[Edgeville]
Npc’s Added:80%
Skills added:Slayer/Woodcutting

[Cathy]
Npc’s Added:50%
Skills added:Fishing/Flecthing/Firemaking/Woodcutting

[Lumby]
Npc’s Added:75%
Skills added:Prayer/Fishing/Woodcutting/Furnace Smithing

Details:
Pretty much I’ve been working on this for quiet awhile and I was wondering if some good coders can help me complete my project. I am a ok coder not the best and would love to learn from the best if you can help me out. Please comment and tell me what you think or what I should edit. Send me TUT’s that are useful anything to make this server better. thanks for reading!

Red:Havn’t Started
Yellow:Started

To do list:
Highscores
Add alot more npc’s
Make more quest
Fix up minigames
Webclient
Fix gates all around world map
